wikipedia_page.main:
Sarah Louise Jones (born 25 June 1990) is a Welsh international field hockey player who plays as a midfielder or forward for Wales and Great Britain.She plays club hockey in the Women's England Hockey League Premier Division for Holcombe.
Jones has also played for Reading and Cardiff Athletic Hockey Club.
She represented Wales at the 2014 Commonwealth Games and 2018 Commonwealth Games.
Jones made her international debut for Great Britain on 17 November 2018 v China.
 She is openly lesbian and competed at the 2020 Summer Olympics along with her partner Leah Wilkinson.
